TopicTitle: Where to purchase the game? GOG? Humble?

Articles.Content:
I want to buy the game as a gift for my friend, who does not use steam.

The KSP Store page is directing me to GoG or Humble? I can't just buy it directly from the KSP store?

If I buy it from one of those 2 sites, will they still get a login to the KSP Store?

Will it come with any 'bloatware'? Or will they be getting the same standalone game that I use?

Thank you so much for your help!

    -    Chris
The company that makes the game was recently bought by another, and the store is not making sales right now as they do some transition stuff.

I can speak to GoG - no bloatware or any BS.

GoG has a client like Steam called Galaxy, but is completely optional.  I run several GoG games and have never installed Galaxy.
Humble will give you a Steam key. So not exactly what you want.
